text:
@NYGovCuomo Do your part. Show respect.
Resign!

Your state has the highest COVID-19 mortality rate as a direct result of 'your' outrageous policies!
I seriously hope the DOJ and the FBI do a full investigation into your forcing nursing homes for elderly into recieving COVID-19 patients.
